positive_examples: This is an example of threat assessment reasoning process.
The threat assessment reasoning process demonstrated clear characteristics.
We observed threat assessment reasoning process in this context.
A typical case of threat assessment reasoning process would involve these features.
The concept of threat assessment reasoning process applies here.
The analytical process of evaluating potential risks, dangers, and hostile activities in operational environments.
negative_examples: This is an example of evasion planning process, not threat assessment reasoning process.
This represents tradecraft reasoning process in general.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: EvasionPlanningProcess, or other types of TradecraftReasoningProcess

definition: A systematic reasoning process for evaluating and prioritizing potential threats.
